name: Hemanth Kuttuboyina
title: Full-Stack Developer & AIML & DS
bio: I am a passionate developer specializing in React, Node.js, and Machine Learning. I love building scalable web apps and experimenting with AI technologies. My work focuses on creating modern, user-friendly solutions with a blend of creativity and engineering precision.

projects.name: ShareHub
projects.description: A file-sharing and collaboration platform inspired by Google Classroom. Features username-only login, role-based access, and file sharing for documents and images.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: My personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and achievements, built with React and Tailwind CSS.

experience.details: Worked on building responsive UIs, integrating APIs, and optimizing performance for client web apps.
